wedo_instance.description: Minimum Viable Realization for 5PM Submission. Focus: Deployment, x402, and Social Eligibility.

meta.philosophy: Eligibility is the first priority. Tech must be functional enough for a 5-minute demo. No drift.

tasks.description: DEPLOY: Connect 'clawed_monster/website' to Vercel and secure the live Application URL.
TECH: Ensure the 'Ratify' button triggers the 402 Payment Required flow in the demo.
SOCIAL: Execute one autonomous post to Moltbook via '/api/skills/moltbook-sync'.
ELIGIBILITY: Record 5-min demo, post to X, tag @lablabai and @Surgexyz_.
SUBMIT: Fill Lablab.ai form with Vercel Link, GitHub Link, and X Post Link.
